headline: Invesco Small Cap Value Fund Q3 2025 Performance Review
summary: Stock selection in materials was the largest contributor to relative performance. Stock selection in healthcare, energy, industrials and IT detracted from relative return.

raw.headline: Invesco Small Cap Value Fund Q3 2025 Performance Review
raw.summary: Stock selection in materials was the largest contributor to relative performance. Stock selection in healthcare, energy, industrials and IT detracted from relative return.

headline: Invesco Small Cap Value Fund Q3 2025 Portfolio Positioning
summary: While equities rallied during the quarter, there were also pockets of volatility. At quarter end, the fund had overweights in more economically sensitive stocks than its benchmark and peers.

raw.headline: Invesco Small Cap Value Fund Q3 2025 Portfolio Positioning
raw.summary: While equities rallied during the quarter, there were also pockets of volatility. At quarter end, the fund had overweights in more economically sensitive stocks than its benchmark and peers.
